RE: License #: CB530246146
Staircase Youth Services
920 E Tinkham Ave
Ludington, MI 49431
Dear Ms. Arneson:
Attached is the Interim Inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
08/17/2021. The inspection has determined substantial compliance with applicable
licensing statutes and rules.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact Claudia Triestram, Area Manager at (616) 552-3662.
Sincerely,
Don Collier, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
Suite 11
701 S. Elmwood
Traverse City, MI 49684
(231) 342-5326
enclosure

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes and does not fall
under MISEP reporting requirements and does not have a DHHS contract.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
Technical Assistance was not required.
V. CONSULTATION
Consultation was not requested.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
The agency was not required to submit any corrective action plans not related to
maltreatment during this licensing period.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules and policy. It is recommended that the facility continue on a
regular license.
August 17, 2021
